title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Students
text: Welcome to my dedicated page where I showcase the brilliant minds I have the privilege to mentor. Here, you’ll find a diverse group of motivated students from both master’s and doctoral programs, each with unique projects and research interests. Explore their profiles to learn more about their academic journeys and the innovative work they are doing under my guidance.
